title: Mike Johnson Just Made It Super Clear He Likes Demi Lovato's Amid Those Dating Rumors
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Mike Johnson made it clear he's super into Demi Lovato by liking her recent Instagram bikini pic.

Demi and Mike recently went on a date and are "enjoying getting to know each other."

Exciting news for people whose interests include Bachelorette stars inexplicably dating A-list celebrities: Demi Lovato and Mike Johnson appear to be more than strangers who are mutually thirsty for each other. And hot on the heels of them going on a date IRL, Mike hopped over to Demi's Instagram and liked a photo of her in a bikini. Read into that however you'd like to!

According to E! News, Demi and Mike are taking things slow but are definitely low-key dating. "They did go on a date and it's been going well," a source dished. "They seem to have a lot in common and are just enjoying getting to know each other." TO WHICH I SAY:

View photos Photo credit: Giphy More

Meanwhile, another source tells Entertainment Tonight that Mike is very "attracted" to Demi and that "Everything went well on the date. They had been messaging and then got in touch in real life through Hannah Brown."



Things between these two started during The Bachelorette, when Demi made it clear she was Team Mike Is Hot. And before their date, Mike told E! that he was all about it, saying "It made me feel sexy. It made me feel good. It's pretty awesome; it's pretty cool, I'm not gonna deny it. She is still a human being, just like I am, and if we were to meet up I'm not gonna be giddy at all. I'm [going to be like] 'What's up, sexy? You got a nice little booty on you. Let's talk.'"

Clearly dude's coming through with the compliments, because this is the pic he liked:

BTW, it looks like a double date between Mike, Demi, Tyler Cameron and Gigi Hadid could be happening based on the comment Mike left on this picture of Tyler....

View photos Photo credit: Instagram More

description: I ship them harder than I ship my own relationship, bye.
